name: scythe
description: Give Claude full control of REAPER DAW â€” 82 tools for tracks, FX, MIDI, automation, rendering and more
long_description: Scythe is an MCP server that lets Claude control REAPER DAW via reapy. 82 tools across 16 domains: project/transport, tracks, track FX, take FX, sends/receives, markers/regions, tempo, media items, MIDI notes/CC, envelopes/automation, time selection, actions, extended state, audio/MIDI devices, and rendering.

tools.name: get_project_info
tools.description: Get current project info: name, BPM, time signature, track count, sample rate

tools.name: get_transport_state
tools.description: Get transport state: playing, paused, recording, cursor position

tools.name: list_tracks
tools.description: List all tracks with volume, pan, mute, solo, arm status

tools.name: list_track_fx
tools.description: List all FX on a track

tools.name: list_midi_notes
tools.description: List MIDI notes in an item

tools.name: list_track_envelopes
tools.description: List automation envelopes on a track

tools.name: perform_action
tools.description: Execute any REAPER action by command ID (escape hatch)

tools.name: render_project
tools.description: Render project with current render settings
